import React, {useRef} from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import axios from 'axios'; import './css/cusStyle.css'; import logo from './img/logo.png'; import profile from './img/profile.png'; export default class cusPay extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); } componentDidMount() { //alert('edit id ' +this.props.match.params.id); axios.get('http://localhost:4000/rental/admineditvehicle/'+this.props.match.params.id) .then(res => { this.setState({ id: res.data.id, type: res.data.type, manufacturer: res.data.manufacturer, year: res.data.year, passengers: res.data.passengers, price: res.data.price }); }) .catch(function (error){ console.log("Can't Get Data"); }) } render() { return(
